name: Charles in Boots
skill: Deals 4420/5420 DMG to an enemy (ranged priority).
ability: Moderately increases the EXP gained from battle.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a cat who wore leather boots. His master was a penniless, uneducated nobody, but this cat used wits and a little trickery to help him become king of the land. When others hoping to pull off the same feat come asking him for help, they usually leave after only a few minutes in apparent satisfaction. You see, he's learned how to talk a good talk and avoid rejecting them outright, which would hurt his brand. It's all part of his cohesive branding strategy.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon from 06/09/2017
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 30/08/2017 - 06/09/2017
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 06/09/2017
◦ Can only be exchanged once

main: "Becoming king's not as easy as it used to be..."
skill: "I hunt in my spare time, and lemme tell you, I've gotten pretty good!"
summon: "Sure, I'm a cat, but since when was that a bad thing?"
limit_break: "This'll make mouse-chasing a lot more exciting!"
